DOC.brief_summary: Four methods of preoxygenation will be compared in healthy volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: After informed consent, each volunteer will undergo the following techniques: Simple mask at "flush" flow (40-60 L/min) Non-rebreather mask at 15 L/min Non-rebreather mask at 60 L/min Bag valve mask with one way exhalation valve at 15 L/min After 3 minutes, the exhaled oxygen will be measured with an oxygen sensor
DOC.criteria: Over 18 years old Any active respiratory pathology (asthma, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, other lung disease, smoking history more than 5 years) pregnant
